css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-f7f1d0eb-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-8,150,176,203),1);border-color:rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-5,0,0,0),1);border-style:solid;border-top-width:2px;border-right-width:2px;border-bottom-width:2px;border-left-width:2px;min-width:100%;flex-wrap:wrap;justify-content:center;row-gap:0px;-moz-column-gap:0%;column-gap:0%;}body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-f7f1d0eb-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-color:rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-5,0,0,0),1);border-top-width:2px;border-right-width:2px;border-bottom-width:2px;border-left-width:2px;border-top-style:solid;border-right-style:solid;border-bottom-style:solid;border-left-style:solid;top:-2px;bottom:-2px;left:-2px;right:-2px;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-f7f1d0eb-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-style:solid;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1920px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-f7f1d0eb-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-style:solid;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-f7f1d0eb-u{max-width:90%;min-width:initial;}}
